full_translation:
*The Pure Subtlety and Primordial Descent of the Great Method*
**Scripture Title:** *The Pure Subtlety and Primordial Descent of the Great Method*
(Author unknown. Twenty-five scrolls. Base text from *The Orthodox Daoist Canon*, Dongzhen Section, Methods Category.)

**Scroll One of *The Pure Subtlety and Primordial Descent of the Great Method***

**The Primordial Beginning’s Pure Subtlety Responds to the Era**
The Primordial Beginning (Yuanshi), in the wondrous transformations of the True Origin, descended as the Celestial Emperor’s trace in the state of Qin, residing in the Cavern of Wondrous Preservation and Transformation. The Perfected of Great Clarity and Kindness, Master Shi Fu, a man of the Han, manifested at the Cavern of Luminous Communication on Dragon Mound Mountain, transmitting the Eastern Florescence.

The Primordial Lord of Penetrating Kindness of the Western Florescence, Pang Qiao Dao, established the Altar of Gengchu in Mianzhu County, Han Prefecture. Twenty-five *li* from the city, the Altar of Gengchu was founded by the Celestial Master of the Eastern Han during the Shenjue era. There are two sites: one is the Western Florescence’s Hall of Vast Perfection.

The Lord of Supreme Harmony and Hidden Mystery, Song Yicheng, of the Maoyi Prefecture, assisted the Three Heavens as Pang Hua’s Teaching-Sustaining [disciple]. The Lord of Numinous Clarity and Harmonious Purity, Xu Dong, of the Qionghuo Prefecture in Pengzhou of the Eastern Han, later emerged as a master with various alternate names.

The Illustrious Great Envoy, Xu Xun, Inner Minister of Celestial Mechanisms, dwelled in the Jade Capital’s Palace of Pure Celebration. The Floating Radiance Celestial Official of Southern Mound, Lang Qi, descended in the Tang at the Floating Radiance Palace of the South Pole in the capital’s western outskirts.

The Primordial Consort of Protective Clarity, the Sagely Mother of Mystic Radiance, Wang Yue (styled Yang), resided in the Palace of Scenic Purity. A person of the Tang, she later transformed into the Sagely Mother of Numinous Radiance, governing the Four Seas of the Eastern Ocean.

The Lord of Illustrious Congealment of the Golden Watchtower, Zu Sui Dao (styled Fangzhong), a native of Lingling Prefecture in Tang Guangxi—also called the Lord of Penetrating Transformation and Singular Brilliance—served in the Cavern of Illustrious Clarity of the Upper Celestial Court of Pure Subtlety. The Lord of Cavernous Purity in Response to the Jade Chamber, Guo Yulong, a native of the Song capital, dwelled in the Purple Numinosity Prefecture, also known as the Lord of Upper Scenery.

The Attendant of the Great Rosy Clouds of Pure Subtlety. The Lord of Purple Radiance and True Blessing, Fu Yangyu (styled Zifang), a native of Fengzhou, resided on Mount Taihua in the Luminous Prosperity Prefecture of the Three Heavens’ Upper Assistant, dwelling by the Western Sea.

The Lord of Dragon Radiance and Daoist Clarity, Yao Zhuang (styled Shuqi), a native of the Western Capital—also called the Lord of Vast Prosperity—served as Attendant of the Three Heavens’ Scriptures, with reciprocal duties across the Three Prefectures, residing in the Prefecture of Flourishing Wisdom.

The Lord of Purple Essence and Jade Kindness, Gao Shi, a native of Yan territory, dwelled in the Prefecture of Luminous Prosperity beneath the Dipper, also known as the Lord of Purple Essence and Jade Kindness of Gao Yun. Attendant of the Three Heavens’ Imperial Procession.

The Perfected of Pure Emptiness of the Western Florescence, Hua Ying, a native of Fengxiang Prefecture, served as the Left Minister of Pure Subtlety and Illustrious Primordiality in the Upper Office of Cavernous Yang.

The Perfected of Penetrating Kindness of Mount Qingcheng, Zhu Dongyuan, a native of Chengdu Prefecture, acted as the Jade Pivot Envoy of the Numinous Empyrean and Upper Minister of Cavernous Kindness in Pure Subtlety.

The Perfected of Cloud Mountain’s Preservation of Unity, Li Shaowei, a native of Fangzhou, served as the Right Minister of the Capital of Pure Subtlety, receiving the divine writ from descending celestial clerks. Envoy of the Five Thunders Institute.

The Perfected of Reclusive Obscurity of Mount Mei, Nan Bidao, a native of Meishan in Meizhou, held the title of Immortal Minister of Preservation and Harmony in Pure Subtlety, appearing and vanishing as a crimson-robed clerk. Master of the Six Penetrations in the Dipper, Controller of Water.

**Upper Clarity**

**Upper Clarity**

The Highest Sage of Upper Clarity, the Jade Dawn Great Dao Lord, resides in the Great Tenuous Palace of the Purple Empyrean and the Celestial Court of the Great Brilliance. The Golden Portals Emperor-Morn Supreme Saint, Primordial Origin Supreme Dao Lord, dwells in the Golden Portals Purple Numinous Palace. The Eastern Flower Director of Life, Azure Lad Dao Lord, governs the Eastern Flower Palace. The Golden Portals Upper Minister, Western City Controller of Perfected Ones, Wang Yuan, styled Fangping, serves as the Left Court beneath the Golden Portals Chengchang Palace. The Celestial King of Lesser Existence, Pure Vacuity Perfected, Wang Bao, styled Zideng, holds the Central Court beneath the Lesser Existence Bohuan Palace. The High Origin Purple Vacuity Primordial Lady, Wei Huacun, styled Xian’an, presides over the Left Court of the High Origin Purple Vacuity Palace and the Purple Chapters Cinnabar Assembly Palace. The Eastern Flower Upper Assistant Director of Life, Perfected Yang Yi’he, serves in the Right Court of the Vermilion Numinous Palace. The Eastern Flower Upper Minister, Emperor-Morn Upper Clarity Immortal Elder, Xu Hui, resides in the Right Court beneath the Purple Yang Dawn Cloud Palace. The Upper Clarity Primordial Lady and Western Flower Sage Mother are both the Lady Chen. The Western Flower Veritable Brilliance Palace hosts the High Immortals of the Jade Chapters. The Grand Illuminator, Celestial Mechanism Intimate Minister, Xu Xun. The Golden Portals Radiant Congealment Primordial Lady, Zu Sui Dao, traces her lineage to the Primordial Lady.

**Numinous Treasure**
The Jade Dawn Dao Lord.

**Great Mystery**
The Primordial One of Great Mystery, Jade Clarity Wondrous Dao Celestial Lord Yu Luoqiao, manifests in the Dragon Brahma Palace of the Mysterious Capital Responsive Brilliance Court. The Second Perfected of Great Mystery, Upper Clarity Wondrous Transformation Celestial Lord Guang Miaoyin, resides in the Mysterious Capital Assembly of Ancestors Court, Universal Brilliance Palace. The Third Perfected of Great Mystery, Supreme Clarity Wondrous Response Celestial Lord Zhen Dingguang, governs the Mysterious Capital Upright Prosperity Court, Vast Clarity Palace. The Jade Flower Mysterious Brilliance Upper Palace lies within the Upper Clarity Jade Capital Mountain. The Golden Mountain Cavern Sovereign Palace stands within the Supreme Clarity Golden Flower Mountain. The Unifying Congealment Jade Clarity Palace is situated atop the Jade Clarity Jade Mountain Capital.

The Supreme Ultimate Perfected, Xu Laile, serves beneath the Supreme Ultimate August Brilliance Palace. The Supreme Ultimate Left Immortal, Ge Xuan, resides beneath the Supreme Ultimate Congealment Palace. The Supreme Ultimate Celebrated Harmony Northern Numinous Intimate Assistant Perfected, Zheng Siyuan, holds court beneath the Supreme Ultimate Primordial Impulse Palace. The Golden Portals Radiant Congealment Primordial Lady dwells in the Golden Portals Illuminated Dao Palace atop the Departed Agriculture Mountain Capital.

**Dao and Virtue**
The Supreme Lord Lao. The Worthy of Literary Beginnings, Pass Keeper Perfected Yin Xi. The Great Mystery Perfected Zhao Long. The Celestial Mountain Perfected Hong Bin. The Mysterious Upper Perfected Lu Hui. The Golden Portals Radiant Congealment Primordial Lady.

**Orthodox Unity**
The Supreme Lord Lao. The Han Celestial Sage Preceptor, Supreme Mystery Upper Minister Zhang Daoling. The Supreme Clarity Perfected, Successor Master Zhang Heng, styled Attendant Within. The Supreme Clarity Perfected, Lineage Master Zhang Lu, styled Marquis of Langzhong. The Lady Master Primordial Lady. Their lineage flowed into Shu, its origins unknown; the fourth generation was the Imperial Censor Zhang Zi. Emerging from Shu to inherit the lineage, the Dragon Tiger Mountain in Guixi of Guangxin continued the immortal succession.

Originally, the lineage was revitalized by the Numinous Brilliance Sage Mother Zhu Xuan, who sat upon a stone by the river in Jiangzhou of Guiyang Prefecture in the Jinghu Southern Circuit and transmitted the teachings to the Golden Portals Radiant Congealment Primordial Lady.

**Essentials of Lineage Transmission and Assembly of Ancestors**
The Golden Portals Radiant Congealment Penetrating Transformation Sole Brilliance Primordial Lady, while in the mountains near the Western Capital, encountered the Supreme Clarity Supreme Mystery Primordial Lord by the banks of the Divine Transformation Stream in the Pure Vacuity Cavern. The Lord transformed into a beautiful woman, bathing by the stream. The Lady then attended her with a towel, escorting her to her seat. For several nights, the Lord alternated between male and female forms, testing her resolve, which remained steadfast.

Then summoning the Master, they boarded a wooden raft and floated upon the stream, whereupon the Lord blew upon them and restored their original place. The doctrines of the Four Lineages were all conferred upon the Master, after which the Lord vanished. From this point, Master Benzhen unified the Four Lineages into one.

The Supreme Clarity Supreme Mystery Primordial Lord Wen Yong resided beneath the halls of the Jinghui Taihe Palace.

*Da Dao Yanqing Jiqing* – For prayers and summoning the thunder spirits.

If the talismans fail to elicit a response in prayers, draft a petition! Alternatively, attach a note to the front of this talisman, seal both ends securely with wax, and inscribe it with sincerity. Present it to the transmission lineage to invoke the Master Jun Zongzhen and summon the thunder spirits.

**Three Primes Dao Supervisor Qingwei Chonghua Seal** – Inscribed above.

**Invoking the Marshal, Dao’s Origin**

During the reign of Yu, the Dao Lord had already descended into the world, moving between existence and non-existence, upholding the Way of the Primordial Beginning. In the twenty-fifth year of King Zhao of Zhou, on the twenty-eighth day of the twelfth lunar month at noon, Lao Jun transmitted the *Scripture of the Dao* and *Scripture of Virtue* to Guan Yin, along with the *Nine Elixirs of Great Clarity* and the *Hidden Writings of the Eight Heavens*. The teachings of the *Western Ascension*, admonitions, and other methods were entrusted to the Perfected Du. The Perfected Du was the first to embody the Dao and its virtue.

In the second year of Guanghe during the reign of Emperor Ling of Han, the Perfected of the Great Ultimate bestowed the *Corpus of Numinous Treasure Scriptures* upon the Perfected Left Immortal Xi of the Great Ultimate at Mount Tiantai (some say Mount Shangyu). These are the ancestral texts of the *Cavern Mystery* corpus.

Later, on the first day of the fifth month in the first year of Han’an during the reign of Emperor Shun of Han (some say the fifteenth day of the first month), the Heavenly Master Zhang descended upon Mount Heming, where he received the *Twenty-Four Ranks of Secret Registers*, the seal, and the sword, establishing the lineage of Orthodox Unity and the Alliance of Might.

From the Zhou to the Qin, Han, and Wei dynasties, though the Three Scriptures were transmitted in the world, their regulations and ranks remained obscure. Until the second year of Anxing in the Jin dynasty, on the day of the First Farmer in the jiazi cycle, the Purple Void Primordial Lady, the Lady Wei of the Southern Marchmount, first transmitted the Way of Highest Clarity to the Perfected Yang, Eastern Flower’s Supreme Assistant and Controller of Destinies. At that time, the celestial scriptures and treasured texts—such as the cloud-scripts, dragon-seals, and the eightfold configurations of the *Assembled Writings*—were beyond the comprehension of the mundane world. Our Primordial Lady, the Perfected, distinguished their talismanic scripts and oral instructions, transcribing them into clerical script. From then on, their transmission flourished, becoming the ancestral lineage of Highest Clarity.

**Establishing the Law**
The *Scripture of the Primordial Beginning* pertains to the Great Thunder Rites. The Great Purification Rites are called the *Celestial Treasure Thunder Purification* (also known as the *Celestial Treasure Purification*) or the *Jade Clarity Thunder Cavern Perfection Purification*. They comprise:
1. The Heavenly Scripture
2. The Cavern Chapters
3. The Heavenly Chapters
4. The Jade Chapters
5. The Jade Writings
6. The Numinous Talismans

Highest Clarity corresponds to the *Cavern Mystery*; Great Clarity to the *Cavern Divinity*. The Divine Empyrean aligns with the Northern Culmen; the Great Tenuity with the Purple Tenuity. The Eastern Culmen corresponds to the Southern Culmen; the Northern Culmen to the Western Culmen. The Purple Sovereign aligns with the Purple Clarity.

**Commanding the Generals**
For a Marshal, Vice Marshal, or High General, use one talismanic messenger. For a Marshal with five messengers, use one talismanic messenger. The same applies to purification and thunder rites.

The *Divine Pivot Thunder Scripture* states: The Heavenly Worthy transforms into Marshals; the Heavenly Lords serve as Generals. Yang becomes the Thunder Duke; Yin becomes the Lightning Matriarch. The left is the Earl of Wind; the right is the Master of Rain. The five directions’ stars manifest as the Five Thunders. The great deities of the eight directions become the Eight Pursuing Messengers above and the Eight Titled Divine Lords, talismanic messengers, and merit officials below. In accordance with the imperial-approved scriptures, generals are established following the statutes, their names memorialized to the Emperor, and their summons invariably answered.

**Talisman of the Primordial Lady’s Incense of Faith**
The Golden Portal’s Illustrious Congealed Dao-Transforming Radiance, the Primordial Lady, Ancestor of the Dao. The Primordial Lady’s transformed appearance: unbound hair, crimson robes with long skirts, holding a thunder casket, riding a blue-gold dragon, accompanied by two Perfected Lords.

**Grand Unity Evolving Sagely Wind-Thunder Wondrous Dao Vast Transformation Perfected Lord Swift Talismanic Messenger Yang Xian**, holding a fire-tipped halberd.
Both appear as mighty warriors: on yang days, the comet-star is employed; on yin days, fire is used.

The Penetrating Wondrous Primordial Florescence Grand Unity Harmonious Primordial Lady Xie Jingang, upon the Jade Radiance Jade Terrace Harmonious Mansion’s Yang Valley Altar to the left.

**Incantation:** *Rongsu han.*

**Jade Capital Lineage of Qingwei**
The Jade Clarity of Qingwei’s Jade Purity.
The Primordial Thearch bestowed the *Wondrous Mystery Scripture* in accordance with the Jade Strategy, conferring it upon the Jade Dawn Dao Lord.
Within kalpas, it resides in the Great Mystery of the Great Luo; at the kalpa’s origin, the Treasure Terrace of Luminous Primordial Purity.
It unfolds and propagates the wondrous Dao, preserving Heaven’s eternal existence.

**Wondrous Mystery Scripture**
The aforementioned scripture is housed in the western corridor of the hall’s side chamber, within the Hall of Pure Mystery and Jade Florescence.

The Primordial Thearch’s Thunder and Lightning descended to teach the Qingwei Jade Strategy in response to the era, totaling one hundred twenty characters.
In Heaven, it was the Primordial Heavenly King who conferred it upon the Dao Lord.
This strategy elicits a response from the Jade Realm; the three characters transmitted within the strategy must be meticulously preserved and passed down.

The Jade Dawn Dao Lord bestowed the Jade Model, granting it to the True Primordial Wondrous Transformation Heavenly Thearch.

**Jade Dawn Strategy**
The Nine Heavens’ Wondrous Dao True Conveyor Yang Yuanjun employed the Great Dao to transmit the *Mysterious Wondrous Scripture*, conferring it upon the Nine Heavens’ Cavernous Luminosity Xu Yuanjun.

**Great Dao’s Mysterious Wondrous Scripture**
Xu Yuanjun possessed the *Jade Brahma Chapter of the Primordial Capital*, which he conferred upon Zhu Perfected of the Jade Hall Celestial Mountain.

**Jade Brahma Chapter of the Primordial Capital**
Formed from Brahma qi, it governs the separation of purity and turbidity.
To the right, it examines the myriad spirits—all are the Primordial Thearch’s prohibited texts.
After receiving this from Yang Yuanjun, it was left to be inherited through generations.

The Perfected of Celestial Mountain subsequently bestowed the *Thunder’s Radiance Shaking the Primordial Chapter* upon the Grand Mystery’s Azure Wisdom Illuminating Transformation Fusang Bu Perfected Lord.

**Thunder’s Radiance Shaking the Primordial Chapter**
Bu Perfected Lord employed the *Great Dao’s Immeasurable Primordial Radiance Jade Talisman*, conferring it upon the Illuminating Congealed Spirit Radiance Preserving Heaven’s Dao Transformation Vast Primordial Lord.

The Dao Transformation Primordial Lord bestowed the *Jade Florescence Treasure Chapter* upon the Luminous Purity Dao Florescence Qiu Yuanjun.

Thereafter, Yuanjun conferred this chapter upon the Grand Clarity Pure Wisdom Master Perfected.

**Secret Oral Instructions of Qingwei**
The Cavernous Radiance of Qingwei, the Purple Florescence of the Precious Balance, the Primordial Harmony Illuminating the Dao, the Grand Unity’s Divine Splendor—Primordial Lord Wang Zhenghong.
Full-moon countenance, phoenix eyes, single-stroke brows, unbound hair wielding a sword, vermilion shoes in the comet-star’s form, dwelling beneath the Purple Radiance Palace Tower to the right of the Grand Primordial Chamber of the Primordial Capital.

**Treasure Mystery Scripture**
Presented to the Three Clarities’ Jade Thearchs, the Queen of Earth, and thereafter used in obeisance.

**Primordial Beginning’s Court-Mandate Incense Talisman**
The right talisman is called "Three Realms’ Court Audience Offering to the Primordial Beginning," wherein the Azure Thearch is commanded to bestow the incense character. For all urgent memorials, burning this incense allows access to the Thearch.

**Primordial Beginning’s Assembly-of-All-Spirits Incense Talisman**
The right talisman is the "Dao Lord’s Command to the Myriad Spirits." Formerly, the Primordial Beginning conferred this incense upon the Dao Lord, who employed it. Now, the master’s lineage uses it to assemble the myriad spirits.

**Primordial Beginning’s Summons-of-Thunder-and-Lightning Incense Talisman**

**Qingwei’s Esoteric Methods of Penetrating the Mysterious**
The Qingwei Flourishing Dawn Preserver-of-Fate Golden Brilliance Primordial Lord Peng Hanyuan: twin topknots, countenance like jade, crescent brows, phoenix eyes, smiling mien, plain robes, crimson skirt, vermilion shoes, wielding a sword, riding a fire dragon. Dwelling amid the Well and Ghost constellations at the Cinnabar Luminance Mansion, he commands the thirty thousand hosts of the Cinnabar Luminance Wind-Fire-Thunder.

The Southern Cinnabar Flowing-Fire Lightning Mother Primordial Lord Guang Xun: jade maiden’s form, wielding a sword, clad in azure robes, vermilion shoes.

The Southern Cinnabar Flying Heaven Wind Earl Divine Lord Lei Guangqing: celestial crown, black face, golden armor, green robes, vermilion shoes, hurling a wind chariot.

The Southern Cinnabar Soaring Heaven Rain Master Divine Lord Xu Lie: celestial crown, azure face, golden armor, jade-green robes, vermilion shoes, hurling a rain chariot.

**Qingwei’s Flying Activation Thunder-and-Lightning Seal**

**General Summons Command**
**Qingwei’s Performance Activation Formula**

The Qingwei Qi-Pivot Primordial August Sovereign Li Qian, of the Purple Void Transformative Perfection Blessing Mansion: unbound hair, jade-maiden countenance, crimson robe, yellow skirt, bearing the Thunder Repository, riding a green dragon.

The Qingwei Primordial Mechanism Primordial Numinous Sovereign Long Ji, with her Primordial Consort of the Transformative Flourishing Splendor Mansion: twin topknots, jade-maiden countenance, slightly ruddy complexion, purple robe with embroidered skirt, wielding a sword, riding a white dragon.

The Qingwei Inspection Command Illuminating Transformative Sovereign Xiu Duan, of the Illuminating Congealed Transformative Yang-Splendor Mansion: high chignon, pale complexion, willow-leaf brows, apricot eyes, azure robe, golden armor, holding an axe, riding a black dragon.

The Three Masters above govern the thunder spirits and inspect the thunderclaps.

**Faith Incense Talisman**
Knock and secretly memorialize for immediate response; in urgent matters, memorialize and report.

**Qingwei Flying Talisman**
Present above to request the Three Masters, issuing summons to the thunderclaps for general use.
Write in the endorsement space: *"Your subject [Name], having received the master’s transmission, reverently complies with the primordial descending master’s decree, memorializing the activation of the Qingwei Flying Talisman for immediate response."*
It may also be burned with fierce fire upon the incense.

Recite: *"Reverently receiving the
Master Sovereign’s
Qingwei Transformative Manifestation, Vast Illumination of the Three Great Primordial Sovereigns’ Dao Decree.
Act with utmost urgency!"*

The Qingwei Numinous Harmony Sovereign Guan Jingqing, with her Primordial Consort of the Transformative Jade-Principle Mansion: phoenix crown, jade countenance, natural brows, phoenix eyes, purple robe, azure skirt, broad sash, vermilion shoes, holding a jade tablet, beneath the Qingwei Heavenly Central Numinous Light Palace.

**Faith Incense Talisman**
**Heart Incense Talisman**

Kneel in reverence and silently intone: *"Nurturing wisdom with profound humility, sincerity, and clarity."* Repeat seven times before withdrawing.

*"Your servant, on the [day] of the [month] in the [year], knelt before Preceptor [Name] to receive transmission of the [Lineage] Dharma School, inheriting the great transformation of Qingwei. Your servant now reverently petitions the Ancestral Master, the Qingwei Numinous Harmony Sovereign Consort Dao Lord: may all that your servant petitions and memorializes be granted heart-to-heart communion and intuitive understanding. For every earnest supplication, may swift and manifest response be bestowed. For all who embody Heaven’s learning of talismanic script, may resonance and spiritual connection be immediately conferred."*

This talisman, wreathed in ninefold golden radiance, descends from Heaven and enters the mouth to completion. Its efficacy is self-evident when practiced, beginning on a *jiǎ* day.

**Qingwei Secret Decree**
Universally applicable to the thunder deities of the Three Realms and the Ten Directions. Visualize the talisman while inscribing it over incense.

**Cavernous Chapters**
**Heavenly Treasure’s Spirit-Moving Cavernous Chapter** – This chapter, revered by the Heavenly Thearch, receives the sacred writ; in timely response to invocation, it commands thunder and lightning, issues decrees to the Three Realms, and serves as the universal rite for purification observances.

**Numinous Treasure’s Spirit-Moving Cavernous Chapter** – Descending to govern all heavens, it commands thunder and lightning, shifts the warp and weft of destiny, with constellations in compliance; it issues decrees to the Three Realms, and the myriad spirits obey. For purification rites, offerings, and supplications, both hidden and manifest realms adhere.

**Divine Treasure’s Spirit-Moving Cavernous Chapter** – Ascending to audience with all heavens, descending to oversee the Six Directions, it commands thunder and lightning for purification rites and devotion to the Dao/Way.

*Scroll Four of the Supreme Descent of the Qingwei Dao/Way*

**Wuji’s Hidden Writ**
**Vacuous Cavernous Numinous Chapters**
The Master says: The **Vacuous Cavernous Numinous Chapters** emanate from the Great Void, presiding over the Three Realms, issuing decrees to the Ten Directions, dispatching thunder and lightning, redeeming the hidden yin, and resonating below with the celestial pole.

**Qian (Purple)** – Ascends to the Three Realms and all heavens; incense is offered, thunder and lightning are commanded, and in grand purification rites, the sages descend.

**Shu (Pure)** – Ascends to the Jade Thearch, commands thunder and lightning, revives the dead, and in grand purification rites, universally proclaims to the Three Realms.

**Ji (Bright)** – Ascends to all heavens, commands thunder and lightning. When worn, the myriad spirits guard the body. It also has the power to open the heavens.

**Xi (Alas)** – Pervades the Five Enclosures, extends to all stars, and moves thunder and lightning. To summon thunder, it opens the Thunder Palace.

**Lou (Vast)** – Ascends to the celestial river, moves thunder and lightning, and presents memorials to all heavens. Written as talismanic writ, it assembles dragon spirits.

**Jing (Direct)** – Exclusively commands thunder and lightning, clears skies and brings rain, dispatches fierce winds, and swiftly yields auspicious responses; the myriad evils submit.

**Gong (Merit)** – Rotates heaven and inverts earth, harmonizes yin and yang, aligns the warp and weft; above, it orders the cosmos, and below, it regulates men and women. When ingested, it cures the myriad illnesses.

**Qi (Vigilant)** – Employs thunder and lightning, harmonizes yin and yang, hastens growth and eliminates evil. It also assembles the Dragon Lords.

**You (Hence)** – Ascends to the Celestial Pole.

For memorializing great matters, inscribe on azure silk, place within a square case, and auspicious responses will swiftly manifest.

**Mao (Flourishing)** – Commands and employs thunder and lightning. Whenever thunder is summoned, it responds in due time; grand fasts and memorials ascend punctually as scheduled.

**Zun (Revering) Dao** – Pervades the Three Realms, universally notifies the Ten Directions, dynamically harmonizes yin and yang, and transforms cold and heat. When this writ is employed, immediate resonance is awaited.

Such is the great model of ritual protocol.

On earth, they are the Envoys of the Five Marchmounts.

*Qingwei Yuanjiang Great Method*, Scroll Twenty:
**Great Unity Flame Illumination Five Thunders**,
also named **Great Unity, Majestic Transforming Fire Mansion Divine Primordial Thunder**.

The Master states: The Great Unity method comprises a total of twelve gates. It revolves with the directions, dispersing through sixty palaces, governing the fortunes and misfortunes born of the sixty *jiazi* cycles. If it points to Zi, the Three Origins bear curses; swiftly resolve them for recovery in seven days.
Gui indicates entanglement with graves and litigation; after ten days of offerings, recovery is certain.
Chou Palace brings grievances seeking redress; unresolved, ten days may not suffice for preservation.
If the life talisman points to Gen, the great limit is pressing; vainly relying on paper offerings brings ten days of sorrow.
Yin signifies the netherworld’s pursuit of the soul; within three days, decline enters the household.
Jia indicates curses from yin persons; swiftly resolve them to avoid pursuit.
Mao, if the talisman points toward the Five Paths, offerings and talismanic dispatches bring improvement in half a month.
If the talisman points to Yi, pestilence is imminent; after ten days of memorials, peace and recovery shall come.
Chen brings pursuit from the Five Temples; performing blessings brings safety in half a month.
Xun signifies ancestral kin seeking offerings; if unheeded, death may come within five days.
Si incurs celestial punishment, with names recorded; within seven days, the soul may descend to the netherworld.
Bing indicates stellar entanglements; after ten days of offerings, the illness shall depart.
Wu brings earthly constellations stirring calamity; swiftly perform offerings for recovery in five days.
Ding, if under the charge of the Granary Controller, incurs reprimand; offerings to the Eastern Hearth bring recovery in one day.
Wei signifies offenses under the Mount Tai Controller; memorials to the Eastern Peak bring return in ten days.
Kun indicates household curses from the living; mutual resolution brings recovery in seven days.
Shen incurs the Killing Spirit and flying earth; offerings bring safety in five days.
Geng signifies the Celestial Emperor’s reprimand; swiftly perform offerings for a month of peace.
You incurs pestilence spirits and vows; offerings to dispel pestilence bring recovery in seven days.
Xin signifies city gods seeking vows; swiftly fulfill them for a month of peace.
Xu incurs the Five Void and crouching corpse ghosts; practicing Daoist methods brings recovery in a month.

**Celestial Scripture of the Boundless**
*Also named Scripture of the Boundless, Scripture of the Great Dao, Celestial Scripture, Cavern Scripture, Scripture of the Ten Characters of Thunderbolt.*

*This text of the utmost extremity is the pivot of Primordial Chaos, the very root of the Great Beginning. It can:*
1. *Govern the revolutions of creation,*
2. *Command and dispatch celestial lords,*

**Pivot of Daoist Methods**
Transmitted by Cloud Mountain Preserver of Unity, True Man Li Shaowei

Within the Dao there is Dao; within the Dao there is method; within method there is method.
The Dao within Dao: a single thought unarisen, the myriad things all quiescent.
The method within Dao: in stillness, dragon and tiger intertwine; in motion, thunder and lightning roar.
The method within method: pacing the stars, forming mudras, reciting incantations, inscribing talismans.
All beyond this is mere numerology.

The Great Dao is wordless—it may be grasped through spirit.
The wondrous method is untransmitted—it may be received through the heart.
Those adept in practice: they enact the Dao, not merely its methods.
Those adept in seeking teachers: they follow the heart, not the person.

One may ask: Does method distinguish between prior-heaven and posterior-heaven?
If inquiring of prior-heaven: there is only the One, yet "Dao" is but a forced name—what then is "method"?
Moreover, the moment a thought stirs, it already belongs to posterior-heaven.
Talismans, diagrams, incantations, mudras—these are but the least of it.

Prior-heaven gives birth—birth without form.
Posterior-heaven responds—response with emotion.
Quiescence responding, response returning to quiescence—who but the perfected can attain this?

Method excludes visualization—visualization is not true.
Method excludes fabrication—fabrication is demonic.
Method excludes shouting—shouting is madness.
Method excludes prayers and praises—prayers and praises are shamanism.
Method exquisitely harmonizes with yin and yang—square and round, movement and stillness, these are it.
The Dao penetrates the Three Powers—heaven, earth, and humanity alone.
Water, fire, wood, metal, earth—correspond to the Five Phases.
East, south, west, north, center—governed by the Five Directions.
Heaven, earth, water, fire, wind, thunder, mountain, marsh—paired with the Eight Trigrams.

Those mired in numerology: when I inscribe talismans, I apply a specific function to a specific aperture—thus aligning with transformation, thus reckoning generation and conquest, thus commencing the brushstroke, thus activating the charge.
The mechanism of spirits and gods—I have grasped it.
Yet they do not know: before the Supreme Ultimate divided, what was yin and yang? What were the Three Powers? What were the Five Phases? What were the Five Directions? What were the Eight Trigrams?

Thus, those of the Dao cast aside their hands and practice—no talismans are needed.
As the ancients said:
*"Inscribing talismans without knowing the aperture—ghosts and gods will laugh.
Inscribing talismans while knowing the aperture—ghosts and gods will cry out in alarm."*

Practitioners today, ignorant of the roots of Dao and method, vainly manipulate paper, mistaking it for the talismanic aperture.
Yet this aperture is no ordinary aperture—formed by the union of Qian and Kun, it is called the *Spirit-Qi Cavity*, containing the essence of Kan and Li.
Seek it within the body—do not seek it elsewhere.
One who knows this single aperture may be spoken to of the Dao.
How could it be merely about method?

*The Supreme Mind-Method Essential Preface* states:
*"Gathered as embryonic breath, employed as the aperture—within Daoist methods, this is the true essential wonder."*
This is a leaked secret—ponder it well.

Talismans are the true credentials of heaven and earth; all borrow cinnabar, ink, paper, and brush.
I alone say: a single point of numinous radiance, penetrating heaven and earth, where spirit resides—what is not a talisman?
It may be empty space, water, fire, tiles, stones, grass, trees, food and drink—it may be present or absent, communicative or transformative. This is Daoist method.

*The Plain Questions* says:
*"Serene emptiness, tranquil indifference—true qi follows. Spirit guarded within—whence comes illness?"*
Human ailments—whether cold or heat, severe or mild—all arise from improper regulation, excessive desires, and lack of moderation. Thus, the six qi’s pernicious influences seize the opportunity to invade.

To treat illness with talismans: talismans are but cinnabar and ink—how can they be inherently numinous?
What makes them numinous is my true qi.
Thus it is said: Talismans have no fixed form—their numinosity lies in qi.
One who understands this may infuse any object with qi—even a grain of millet or a blade of grass can aid others.

Talismans are instruments of yin-yang harmony.
Only the utterly sincere in the world can wield them.
If sincerity is lacking, they naturally fail to work.
Thus it is said:
*"With my essence, unite the essence of heaven, earth, and the myriad things;
With my spirit, unite the spirit of heaven, earth, and the myriad things."*
Essence interlocks with essence, spirit leans upon spirit—thus, a scrap of paper may summon spirits and gods, and they cannot but respond.

Methods may emerge from the same lineage—identical talismans, identical mudras—yet their application often fails. Why? Sincerity is lacking.
Where sincerity is lacking, self-trust falters.
Where self-trust falters, doubt arises.
Once doubt arises, the center loses its anchor.
With no anchor at the center, how can resonance occur?
Thus it is said: All methods are mind-methods; when the mind is open, the method is open.
This openness is the unity of the Three Powers and one qi.

Heaven operates through qi, earth brings forth through qi, yin and yang contract and expand through qi, wind and thunder stir through qi, the human body breathes through qi, Daoist methods resonate through qi.
Those adept in practice know: spirit arises from qi, qi governs spirit.
External thoughts do not enter, internal thoughts do not exit—one qi, harmonious and balanced, returns to the root and restores life.
In movement and stillness, sitting and lying down, ceaselessly abide—thus nurturing the vast and boundless.

When applied to methods, one harmonizes one’s true qi with the creative transformations of Heaven and Earth. Thus, exhaling becomes clouds and rain, inhaling becomes thunder and lightning. When employing generals, the primordial spirit naturally awakens; when subduing evil, spirits and demons naturally submit. Permeating Heaven and penetrating Earth, emerging from darkness and entering the unseen—what transformation is not mine to command? Yet if the center lacks an anchor, qi scatters and spirit dims. In practice, one merely clings to talismans and incantations, hoping for a stroke of luck in ten thousand—such efforts, I see, will not succeed.

Someone asked: What is the teaching on transforming spirit?
At the primordial beginning of the kalpa, the one qi divided into the true. I am the primordial beginning; the primordial beginning is I. This is called transforming spirit. Yet some sit with eyes closed, visualizing a general arriving from some direction. Others massage and contract, circulating inner qi to merge with outer qi. Alas, these are delusions. If one truly attains the numinous general—the teaching of the general’s numinosity—then in ordinary times and leisurely days, one nurtures spirit through stillness, and spirit naturally awakens; one harmonizes qi through equilibrium, and qi naturally becomes true in its function. In practice, spirit naturally unites with spirit, qi naturally unites with qi. With a single glance or a single thought, marshals, generals, officers, and soldiers teem as if at one’s side.

The Yellow Emperor said: The cosmos is in the palm of your hand; the myriad transformations arise within your body. Those who know this Way are the great Heaven and Earth, while Heaven and Earth are small to them. Zhuangzi said: The corpse abides, yet the dragon appears; the abyss is silent, yet thunder resounds. Those who know this Way may speak of the subtleties of movement and stillness. Thunder spirits come and go like flashing lightning; the world’s stale vapors cannot long adhere. Summon them swiftly and dismiss them promptly—do not indulge in empty formalities. When they possess a body, they illuminate its radiance; when generals descend, they report their directives. Sealing the arm with a single drop of water or rescuing the lost with a falling banner—if the spirit is not numinous, if the affair does not respond, these are mere techniques. They may be used to establish teachings through the spirit-way, but those who know the Dao do not rely on them.

Someone asked: What is the way to subdue evil?
Simply cultivate oneself to rectitude. Have you not heard that the flower and moon spirits dared not appear before Di Liangong? Even ghosts and spirits fear the upright gentleman—how much more so the man of the Dao!

Someone asked: What is the teaching on refinement and deliverance?
To refine the hun-soul, one must first refine the spirit; to deliver others, one must first deliver oneself. This is the teaching of refinement and deliverance. The one nature is numinous and luminous, enduring as long as Heaven. Yet through greed and attachment, there is death and birth; the four great elements disperse, and no form remains to cling to. Still, one clings to the deluded mind, unaware of liberation. Thus one revolves through the six paths, emerging and submerging in the three realms. The Most High, moved by compassion, bequeathed methods and teachings so that those of the Dao might awaken their delusion with their truth, refine their yin with their yang, and quicken their spirit with their spirit.

With my qi, I return their qi. This lies solely in settling the mind and stabilizing thoughts, focusing the will and maintaining practice—if a single thought strays, perfection is not attained.

As for talismanic decrees and ritual protocols, these are but the outward forms of the teaching; the texts exist here, yet their essence does not reside here.

**Talisman Protocol**
When inscribing talismans, the mind must be pure and still, free of stray thoughts.
Unfurl paper and brush upon the table, knock the teeth, and visualize golden light streaming from both eyes to suffuse the paper.
Next, write the seal-script characters, imagining them as golden.
Then inscribe the general’s name, visualizing the general entering the talisman.
Finally, sweep with the *fire brush* to seal it, envisioning the paper ablaze with golden fire. Below the talisman, note the intended purpose.

Summons the myriad spirits.

**Life Glyph**
Hastens childbirth. Recite the three glyphs while pacing, then inscribe the talisman for application or consumption.

**Qi Glyph**
For healing; may be swallowed.

**Hero Glyph**
Treats pestilence. Apply as a pacifying talisman, consume, or use for fumigation. Recite: *“Spirits of the Abyssal Cavern.”*

□ (Void Glyph)
Summons all thunder spirits.

**Helmet Glyph**
Pacifies the earth. For those afflicted by earthly transgressions, inscribe this talisman along with *golden coins* and *spirit horses*, then burn them at the offending direction. Also form this glyph into a talismanic pill for the patient to consume.

**The Heavenly Scripture of the Supreme Ultimate Dao**
右 (*Right*)—deploys and commands the Three Realms, swiftly dispatching thunder and lightning.
無 (*Non-Existence*)—prostrates and petitions the Supreme Thearch. Inscribe in cinnabar on yellow paper and place within the petition document; suitable for grand supplications. Also used in *Yellow Register Retreats*.

**Utmost Glyph**
Petitions the Thearch. For supplications, burn upon incense to descend the myriad spirits.

**Origin Glyph**
Petitions the Supreme Thearch, also named *Primal Origin One Qi Cavern-Real Heavenly Chapter*. For grand supplications with assured response, where other methods fail.

**Summoning the Myriad Spirits for Three Realms’ Great Matters**
Upon hearing the command, they descend immediately.

**Origin Glyph**
Petitions the Supreme Thearch to align the stars’ courses. In *Yellow Register Lingbao Retreat* rites, burn at the altar’s center to descend the myriad spirits. For critical illnesses, burn facing the Heavenly Gate. All thunder and lightning spirits obey without fail. May also redeem the sunken and lost; inscribe in cinnabar on blue-green or white silk, titled *Lingbao Talismanic Mandate*.

**Mystery Glyph**
Usage as above. For pestilential qi, burn facing the afflicted direction to disperse it immediately. Named *Cavern Spirit Abyssal Cavern Scripture*.

**Dynamic Glyph**
Petitions the Supreme Thearch to mobilize the stars, aligning their courses and commanding thunder. For grand supplications, deploying the myriad spirits, healing illnesses, eradicating evil, delivering from childbirth perils, rousing dragons, subduing flood-dragons, and vanquishing all demonic specters and malevolent spirits. For solar and lunar eclipses or yin-yang disharmony, all may be remedied. Burn in an open space; inscribing the purpose enhances efficacy.

**Static Glyph**
Pacifies mountains and stabilizes peaks, safeguards the state and secures the household, halts rain and stills winds, calms waves and silences surges, commands thunder and lightning—none in the Three Realms remain unsettled. Summons harmonious qi to address all ailments and disturbances; may be burned or used for pacification. Also named *Primal Origin Pacifying and Preserving Kalpa Heavenly Chapter*.

**Radiance (Two Glyphs)**
Petitions the Supreme Thearch to proclaim across the Three Realms and stellar constellations. For grand supplications of rain and sunshine, or minor petitions for longevity and life preservation. Hang in the central courtyard to illuminate the entire household, summoning harmony and securing peace for state and family. Also named *Primal Origin Numinous Radiance Wondrous Scripture*. Wearing it shields the body with the myriad spirits, redeems the sunken, eternally dispels darkness, and reveals light—all sins dissolve. None fail to receive the essence of the Three Luminaries and stellar constellations, gathering form to preserve life.

**Qi Glyph**
Also named *Primal Origin One Qi Illuminating Three Sceneries True Talisman*. For all matters within the Six Harmonies and Three Realms, regardless of scale, it may be employed. For all thunder methods, mastery of this ensures efficacy; with sincere practice, swift verification follows.

---

**Qingwei Heavenly-Ordained Five Thunder Great Method**
**General Ranks**
**Thunder Master, Statute-Commanding Great Spirit, Flame Thearch Heavenly Lord Deng Xie**—
Wears a *soaring-heaven cap*, *heavenly official’s* countenance, full golden armor, vermilion robes, vermilion boots, wields a sword, and rides a golden dragon.

**Thunder and Lightning Commander-in-Chief, Jade Mansion Perfected Lord Xin Zhongyi**—
Wears a *soaring-heaven cap*, *earthly official’s* countenance, golden armor, green robes, vermilion boots, and holds a brush.

**Thunder Duke, Cavern Yang Shaking Mystery Great Spirit Jiang Hechong**—
Wears a *boar-head crown*, crimson hair, blue-green face, golden armor, vermilion robes, vermilion boots, and wields a small golden axe in both hands.

**Lightning Mother, Cavern Yin Illuminating Command Perfected Lady Xiu Wenying**—
Wears a *phoenix crown*, azure hair, *jade maiden’s* countenance, fine golden armor, green robes, vermilion boots, wields a sword in the right hand, and cradles a luminous pearl in the left.

**Wind Earl, Soaring Heavenly Radiance Great Spirit Fang Daozhang**—
Wears a *five-cloud crown*, handsome countenance, golden armor, green robes, vermilion boots, and brandishes a *wind wheel*.

**Rain Master, Sweet Dew Heavenly Numinous Great Spirit Chen Huafu**—
Wears a *Supreme Mystery crown*, round eyes, fine beard, ruddy face, golden armor, green robes, vermilion boots, and brandishes a *fire wheel*.

**Eastern Azure Origin Thunder King Ma Yulin**—
Wears a *central crown*, crimson hair, blue-green face, golden armor, green robes, boots, and wields an axe.

**Southern Vermilion Origin Thunder King Guo Yuanhuang**—
Wears a *central crown*, yellow hair, ruddy face, golden armor, vermilion robes, vermilion boots, and brandishes a *fire wheel*.

**Western Radiant Origin Thunder King Fang Zhonggao**—
Wears a *central crown*, white hair, purple face, golden armor, white robes, vermilion boots, and brandishes a *fire wheel*.

**Northern Mysterious Origin Thunder King Deng Gongchen**—
Wears a *central crown*, blue-green hair, black face, golden armor, black robes, vermilion boots, and wields an iron staff.

**Central Palace Central Principle Thunder King Tian Yuanzong**—
Wears a *central crown*, red hair, ruddy face, yellow robes, and brandishes a *fire wheel*.

Evolving Celebration, Evolving Illumination, Evolving Numinosity, Evolving Mystery, Evolving Command, Evolving Wood, Evolving Fire, Evolving Metal, Evolving Water, Evolving Earth, Evolving Pivot, Evolving Mechanism, Evolving Heaven, Evolving Earth, Evolving Sun, Evolving Moon, Evolving Chronograms, Evolving Stars, Evolving Chaos, Evolving Might, Evolving Circulation, Evolving Clouds, Evolving Directions, Evolving Jia, Evolving Yi, Evolving Bing, Evolving Ding, Evolving Wu, Evolving Ji, Evolving Geng, Evolving Xin, Evolving Ren, Evolving Gui.

Vast Heaven, Vast Earth, Vast Sun, Vast Moon, Vast Chronograms, Vast Stars, Vast Wood, Vast Fire, Vast Metal, Vast Earth, Vast Pivot, Vast Mechanism, Vast Transformation, Vast Circulation, Vast Illumination, Vast Fierceness, Vast Soaring, Vast Jia, Vast Yi, Vast Ding, Vast Wu, Vast Ji, Vast Geng, Vast Gui, Vast Xin, Vast Ren, Vast Qian, Vast Kan, Vast Gen, Vast Xun, Vast Zhen, Vast Li, Vast Kun, Vast Dui.

**Heart Market Enclosure’s Purple Jade Thunder Division (also called Barbarian Thunder):**
Heavenly Cavern, Heavenly Perfection, Complete Perfection, Heavenly Garrison, Mighty, Ice Wheel, Flowing Radiance, Wind Leadership, Shout of Command, Origin Thearch, Net-Biting, Heavy Circulation, Fetid Mist, Thunderclap, Flying Lightning, Immortal Capital, Fire Cloud, Wind-Fire, Wind Court, Void Origin, Divine Command, Vast Splendor, Cavernous Yang, Golden Qi, Golden Essence, Azure Grove, Traversing Darkness, Flame Barrier, Jade Yang, Origin Binding, Flying Transformation, Might Illumination.

**Great Horn Enclosure’s Cavernous Radiant Barbarian Thunder Division:**
Eastern Florescence Great Spirit, Southern Florescence Great Flame, Western Florescence Great Harmony, Northern Florescence Great Peace, Southeast Corner Flame, Southwest Corner Scorching, Northeast Corner Illumination, Northwest Corner Heroism, Horn Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Neck Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Root Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Chamber Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Heart Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Tail Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Winnowing Basket Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Well Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Ghost Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Willow Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Star Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Spread Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Wings Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Chariot Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Straddling Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Bond Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Stomach Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Pleiades Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Net Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Turtle Beak Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Orion Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Dipper Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Ox Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Maiden Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Void Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Rooftop Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Encampment Mansion Heavenly Florescence, Wall Mansion Heavenly Florescence.

**Five Heavens Verification Thunder Division:**

**Northern Culmen Heaven-Governing Thunder Division:**
Upper Florescence, Central Florescence, Flame Thearch Scorching Yang Origin Florescence, Circulation Transformation, Pure Void Leaping Numinosity, Cavernous Pure Purple Radiance, All Directions Chaotic Flying Transformation, Yang Aura Vast Command, Floating Radiance.

**Three Heavens Wind-Fire Thunder Division:**
Forty-Five Ranks.
Transforming Thunder, Six Ranks.

**Vermilion City Vast [Missing Character] Spirit**, Assembly of Eighty-One Ranks.
The above are termed **Radiant Qi Thunder**.

**Three Heavens Official Duties and Ranks**
**Male Officials:**
*Qingwei* ○○ Envoy, *Yuyu* ○○ Envoy, *Dachi* ○○ Envoy.
**Investigative Offices:** Cavern Real, Cavern Numinous, Cavern Luminous, Cavern Yang, Inspecting Visitor, Rectifying Visitor, Upright Visitor, Selecting Visitor, Guarding Visitor, Penetrating Visitor.
**Summoning Offices:** Summoning the Real, Summoning the Primordial, Inspecting the Luminous, Exalting the Radiant.

chunks.original_text: 清微元降大法 经名：清微元降大法。 撰人不详。 二十五卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞真部方法类。 清微元降大法卷之一 元始清微应运 元始 真元妙化天帝迹态，秦降邻国，洞妙保化宫。 泰明清惠真人师复，汉人龙丘山通明洞东华化。 西华通惠元君庞悄道，汉州绵竹县庚除治。 去邑二十五里，神爵年间东汉天师立庚除治。 有二处，一曰西华广真宫。 太和伊玄元君宋益诚，茂仪府庞化三天扶教。 灵妙和澄元君需东，琼和府东汉彭州，后出为师，别号不一。 高明大使天机内相许逊，玉都清庆宫。 南陵浮光天官朗期，唐降京西南极浮光宫。 护明元妃玄光圣母王说，字泱，景清宫。 唐人，后化为灵光圣母，东海主四溟事。 金阙昭凝元君祖遂道，字昉仲，唐广西零陵郡人，一云通化一辉元君。 清微侍元上宸洞昭府。 琼室内应洞清元君郭玉隆，宋京师人，紫灵府，一云上景元君。 清微太霞侍宸。 紫光曜真福和元君傅央堉，字子方，酆州人，三天上辅昌耀府太华山，居西海。 龙光道明元君姚庄，字淑奇，西京人，一云广昌元君。 三天侍经，有往还三府，隆慧府。 紫英玉惠元君高奭，燕地人，洞耀景丰府斗下，一云高运紫英玉惠元君。 三天侍御。 西华清虚真人华英，凤翔府人，洞阳上宰清微明元左卿。 青城通惠真人朱洞元，成都府人，神霄玉枢使清微洞惠上卿。 云山保一真人李少微，房州人，清微都元右卿，天降神吏云授。 五雷院使。 眉山混隐真人南毕道，眉州眉山人，清微保和仙卿，隐见朱衣吏云当称。 斗中六通掌水使者。 上清
chunks.translated_text:
*The Pure Subtlety and Primordial Descent of the Great Method*
**Scripture Title:** *The Pure Subtlety and Primordial Descent of the Great Method*
(Author unknown. Twenty-five scrolls. Base text from *The Orthodox Daoist Canon*, Dongzhen Section, Methods Category.)

**Scroll One of *The Pure Subtlety and Primordial Descent of the Great Method***

**The Primordial Beginning’s Pure Subtlety Responds to the Era**
The Primordial Beginning (Yuanshi), in the wondrous transformations of the True Origin, descended as the Celestial Emperor’s trace in the state of Qin, residing in the Cavern of Wondrous Preservation and Transformation. The Perfected of Great Clarity and Kindness, Master Shi Fu, a man of the Han, manifested at the Cavern of Luminous Communication on Dragon Mound Mountain, transmitting the Eastern Florescence.

The Primordial Lord of Penetrating Kindness of the Western Florescence, Pang Qiao Dao, established the Altar of Gengchu in Mianzhu County, Han Prefecture. Twenty-five *li* from the city, the Altar of Gengchu was founded by the Celestial Master of the Eastern Han during the Shenjue era. There are two sites: one is the Western Florescence’s Hall of Vast Perfection.

The Lord of Supreme Harmony and Hidden Mystery, Song Yicheng, of the Maoyi Prefecture, assisted the Three Heavens as Pang Hua’s Teaching-Sustaining [disciple]. The Lord of Numinous Clarity and Harmonious Purity, Xu Dong, of the Qionghuo Prefecture in Pengzhou of the Eastern Han, later emerged as a master with various alternate names.

The Illustrious Great Envoy, Xu Xun, Inner Minister of Celestial Mechanisms, dwelled in the Jade Capital’s Palace of Pure Celebration. The Floating Radiance Celestial Official of Southern Mound, Lang Qi, descended in the Tang at the Floating Radiance Palace of the South Pole in the capital’s western outskirts.

The Primordial Consort of Protective Clarity, the Sagely Mother of Mystic Radiance, Wang Yue (styled Yang), resided in the Palace of Scenic Purity. A person of the Tang, she later transformed into the Sagely Mother of Numinous Radiance, governing the Four Seas of the Eastern Ocean.

The Lord of Illustrious Congealment of the Golden Watchtower, Zu Sui Dao (styled Fangzhong), a native of Lingling Prefecture in Tang Guangxi—also called the Lord of Penetrating Transformation and Singular Brilliance—served in the Cavern of Illustrious Clarity of the Upper Celestial Court of Pure Subtlety. The Lord of Cavernous Purity in Response to the Jade Chamber, Guo Yulong, a native of the Song capital, dwelled in the Purple Numinosity Prefecture, also known as the Lord of Upper Scenery.

The Attendant of the Great Rosy Clouds of Pure Subtlety. The Lord of Purple Radiance and True Blessing, Fu Yangyu (styled Zifang), a native of Fengzhou, resided on Mount Taihua in the Luminous Prosperity Prefecture of the Three Heavens’ Upper Assistant, dwelling by the Western Sea.

The Lord of Dragon Radiance and Daoist Clarity, Yao Zhuang (styled Shuqi), a native of the Western Capital—also called the Lord of Vast Prosperity—served as Attendant of the Three Heavens’ Scriptures, with reciprocal duties across the Three Prefectures, residing in the Prefecture of Flourishing Wisdom.

The Lord of Purple Essence and Jade Kindness, Gao Shi, a native of Yan territory, dwelled in the Prefecture of Luminous Prosperity beneath the Dipper, also known as the Lord of Purple Essence and Jade Kindness of Gao Yun. Attendant of the Three Heavens’ Imperial Procession.

The Perfected of Pure Emptiness of the Western Florescence, Hua Ying, a native of Fengxiang Prefecture, served as the Left Minister of Pure Subtlety and Illustrious Primordiality in the Upper Office of Cavernous Yang.

The Perfected of Penetrating Kindness of Mount Qingcheng, Zhu Dongyuan, a native of Chengdu Prefecture, acted as the Jade Pivot Envoy of the Numinous Empyrean and Upper Minister of Cavernous Kindness in Pure Subtlety.

The Perfected of Cloud Mountain’s Preservation of Unity, Li Shaowei, a native of Fangzhou, served as the Right Minister of the Capital of Pure Subtlety, receiving the divine writ from descending celestial clerks. Envoy of the Five Thunders Institute.

The Perfected of Reclusive Obscurity of Mount Mei, Nan Bidao, a native of Meishan in Meizhou, held the title of Immortal Minister of Preservation and Harmony in Pure Subtlety, appearing and vanishing as a crimson-robed clerk. Master of the Six Penetrations in the Dipper, Controller of Water.

**Upper Clarity**

chunks.original_text: 上清高圣玉晨大道君，紫宸太华大天帝太微华明宫。 金阙帝晨太平后圣玄元上道君，金阙紫灵宫。 方诸东华司命青童道君，方诸宫。 金阙上宰西城总真真人王远，字方平，金阙成昌宫阙下左府也。 小有天王清虚真人王褒，字子登，小有博爟宫阙下中府。 高元紫虚元君魏华存，字贤安，高元紫虚宫左府紫章丹会宫阙下。 东华上佐司命真人杨义和，端灵右府。 东华上相帝晨上清仙翁许翙，紫阳晨云宫右府阙下。 上清元君、西华圣母谌母也。 西华谅光宫高仙上明玉章。 高明大使天机内相许逊。 金阙昭凝元君祖遂道，本派自元君始。 灵宝 玉晨道君。 太玄玄一真人玉清妙道天君郁罗翘，玄都应明府龙梵宫应化府。 太玄玄二真人上清妙化天君光妙音，玄都宗荟府溥昭宫。 太玄玄三真人太清妙感天君真定光，玄都正昌府广清宫。 玉华玄明上宫。 在上清玉京山内。 金山洞皇宫。 在太清金华山中。 统凝玉清宫。 在玉清玉山上京。 太极真人徐来勒，太极皇耀宫阙下。 太极左仙筑葛玄，太极凝曹宫阙下。 太极庆融北灵内辅真人郑思远，太极元冲府阙下。 金阙昭凝元君，金阙明道宫离农山上京。 道德 太上老君。 文始先生关令真人尹喜。 太玄真人赵隆。 天山真人洪宾。 玄上真人鲁惠。 金阙昭凝元君。 正一 太上老君。 汉三天圣师泰玄上相张道陵。 太清真人嗣师君张衡，侍中。 太清真人系师君张鲁，阆中侯。 女师元君。 流沈于蜀，莫知所承，御史张滋，第四代也。 出蜀承世，广信贵溪龙虎继袭仙源。 本振因灵光圣母朱烜，在荆湖南路桂阳军江渚石上坐，授金阙昭凝元君。 师承集要宗会 金阙昭凝通化一辉元君，於西京近地山中，有曰清虚洞神化溪之滨，遇泰清泰玄元君，化为美女，濯于溪滨。 师遂执巾侍于傍，奉迎至座。 凡数夕，或成男相倏，又为女试，其志坚。
chunks.translated_text:
**Upper Clarity**

The Highest Sage of Upper Clarity, the Jade Dawn Great Dao Lord, resides in the Great Tenuous Palace of the Purple Empyrean and the Celestial Court of the Great Brilliance. The Golden Portals Emperor-Morn Supreme Saint, Primordial Origin Supreme Dao Lord, dwells in the Golden Portals Purple Numinous Palace. The Eastern Flower Director of Life, Azure Lad Dao Lord, governs the Eastern Flower Palace. The Golden Portals Upper Minister, Western City Controller of Perfected Ones, Wang Yuan, styled Fangping, serves as the Left Court beneath the Golden Portals Chengchang Palace. The Celestial King of Lesser Existence, Pure Vacuity Perfected, Wang Bao, styled Zideng, holds the Central Court beneath the Lesser Existence Bohuan Palace. The High Origin Purple Vacuity Primordial Lady, Wei Huacun, styled Xian’an, presides over the Left Court of the High Origin Purple Vacuity Palace and the Purple Chapters Cinnabar Assembly Palace. The Eastern Flower Upper Assistant Director of Life, Perfected Yang Yi’he, serves in the Right Court of the Vermilion Numinous Palace. The Eastern Flower Upper Minister, Emperor-Morn Upper Clarity Immortal Elder, Xu Hui, resides in the Right Court beneath the Purple Yang Dawn Cloud Palace. The Upper Clarity Primordial Lady and Western Flower Sage Mother are both the Lady Chen. The Western Flower Veritable Brilliance Palace hosts the High Immortals of the Jade Chapters. The Grand Illuminator, Celestial Mechanism Intimate Minister, Xu Xun. The Golden Portals Radiant Congealment Primordial Lady, Zu Sui Dao, traces her lineage to the Primordial Lady.

**Numinous Treasure**
The Jade Dawn Dao Lord.

**Great Mystery**
The Primordial One of Great Mystery, Jade Clarity Wondrous Dao Celestial Lord Yu Luoqiao, manifests in the Dragon Brahma Palace of the Mysterious Capital Responsive Brilliance Court. The Second Perfected of Great Mystery, Upper Clarity Wondrous Transformation Celestial Lord Guang Miaoyin, resides in the Mysterious Capital Assembly of Ancestors Court, Universal Brilliance Palace. The Third Perfected of Great Mystery, Supreme Clarity Wondrous Response Celestial Lord Zhen Dingguang, governs the Mysterious Capital Upright Prosperity Court, Vast Clarity Palace. The Jade Flower Mysterious Brilliance Upper Palace lies within the Upper Clarity Jade Capital Mountain. The Golden Mountain Cavern Sovereign Palace stands within the Supreme Clarity Golden Flower Mountain. The Unifying Congealment Jade Clarity Palace is situated atop the Jade Clarity Jade Mountain Capital.

The Supreme Ultimate Perfected, Xu Laile, serves beneath the Supreme Ultimate August Brilliance Palace. The Supreme Ultimate Left Immortal, Ge Xuan, resides beneath the Supreme Ultimate Congealment Palace. The Supreme Ultimate Celebrated Harmony Northern Numinous Intimate Assistant Perfected, Zheng Siyuan, holds court beneath the Supreme Ultimate Primordial Impulse Palace. The Golden Portals Radiant Congealment Primordial Lady dwells in the Golden Portals Illuminated Dao Palace atop the Departed Agriculture Mountain Capital.

**Dao and Virtue**
The Supreme Lord Lao. The Worthy of Literary Beginnings, Pass Keeper Perfected Yin Xi. The Great Mystery Perfected Zhao Long. The Celestial Mountain Perfected Hong Bin. The Mysterious Upper Perfected Lu Hui. The Golden Portals Radiant Congealment Primordial Lady.

**Orthodox Unity**
The Supreme Lord Lao. The Han Celestial Sage Preceptor, Supreme Mystery Upper Minister Zhang Daoling. The Supreme Clarity Perfected, Successor Master Zhang Heng, styled Attendant Within. The Supreme Clarity Perfected, Lineage Master Zhang Lu, styled Marquis of Langzhong. The Lady Master Primordial Lady. Their lineage flowed into Shu, its origins unknown; the fourth generation was the Imperial Censor Zhang Zi. Emerging from Shu to inherit the lineage, the Dragon Tiger Mountain in Guixi of Guangxin continued the immortal succession.

Originally, the lineage was revitalized by the Numinous Brilliance Sage Mother Zhu Xuan, who sat upon a stone by the river in Jiangzhou of Guiyang Prefecture in the Jinghu Southern Circuit and transmitted the teachings to the Golden Portals Radiant Congealment Primordial Lady.

**Essentials of Lineage Transmission and Assembly of Ancestors**
The Golden Portals Radiant Congealment Penetrating Transformation Sole Brilliance Primordial Lady, while in the mountains near the Western Capital, encountered the Supreme Clarity Supreme Mystery Primordial Lord by the banks of the Divine Transformation Stream in the Pure Vacuity Cavern. The Lord transformed into a beautiful woman, bathing by the stream. The Lady then attended her with a towel, escorting her to her seat. For several nights, the Lord alternated between male and female forms, testing her resolve, which remained steadfast.

chunks.original_text: 叩帅 道原 禹时道君已降世，出有入无，奉行元始之道。 老君周昭王二十五年十二月二十八日午时，授关尹道德二经，及太清九丹、八天隐文。 西升教诫等法尹，付杜真人。 杜真人即道德之始也。 汉灵帝光和二年，太极真人於天台山，一云上虞山。 授太极左仙翕真人灵宝众经，是谓洞玄众经之祖也。 又后汉顺帝汉安元年五月一日，一云正月＋五日。 降鹤呜山，授张天师二十四阶秘箓印剑，正一盟威之宗。 伏自周秦汉魏之间，三经虽传于世，而科品未彰。 至晋安兴二年甲子先农日，紫虚元君南岳魏夫人，始以上清之道，授东华上佐司命杨真人。 彼时天经宝文，拜云霄龙篆八会之体，非世间可得而究识焉。 我元君真人，别其符文经诀，变作隶书。 自此流传方盛，是为上清之祖也。 立法 元始某经，则是大雷法。 大斋法称云， 天宝雷斋，日天宝斋。 一云玉清雷洞真斋。 一天经。 二洞章。 三天章。 四玉章。 五玉书。 六灵符。 上清，洞玄。 太清，洞神。 神霄，北极。 太微，紫微。 束极，南极。 北极，西极。 紫皇，紫清。 命将 如元帅副帅上将，用符使一。 如元帅五使者，用一符使。 斋与雷法同此例。 《神枢雷经》曰：天尊化帅，天君为将，阳为雷公，阴为电母，左为风伯，右为雨师。 五方星化五雷。 八方大神，上为八追使者，下为八号神君符使功曹。 奉帝准经，依章立将，命名奏帝，号召皆应。 祖元君信香符 金阙昭凝道化一辉元君，祖遂道。 元君变相，披发绯衣长裙，手执雷匣，乘青金龙，二真君从之。 一 二 三 符使
chunks.translated_text:
**Invoking the Marshal, Dao’s Origin**

During the reign of Yu, the Dao Lord had already descended into the world, moving between existence and non-existence, upholding the Way of the Primordial Beginning. In the twenty-fifth year of King Zhao of Zhou, on the twenty-eighth day of the twelfth lunar month at noon, Lao Jun transmitted the *Scripture of the Dao* and *Scripture of Virtue* to Guan Yin, along with the *Nine Elixirs of Great Clarity* and the *Hidden Writings of the Eight Heavens*. The teachings of the *Western Ascension*, admonitions, and other methods were entrusted to the Perfected Du. The Perfected Du was the first to embody the Dao and its virtue.

In the second year of Guanghe during the reign of Emperor Ling of Han, the Perfected of the Great Ultimate bestowed the *Corpus of Numinous Treasure Scriptures* upon the Perfected Left Immortal Xi of the Great Ultimate at Mount Tiantai (some say Mount Shangyu). These are the ancestral texts of the *Cavern Mystery* corpus.

Later, on the first day of the fifth month in the first year of Han’an during the reign of Emperor Shun of Han (some say the fifteenth day of the first month), the Heavenly Master Zhang descended upon Mount Heming, where he received the *Twenty-Four Ranks of Secret Registers*, the seal, and the sword, establishing the lineage of Orthodox Unity and the Alliance of Might.

From the Zhou to the Qin, Han, and Wei dynasties, though the Three Scriptures were transmitted in the world, their regulations and ranks remained obscure. Until the second year of Anxing in the Jin dynasty, on the day of the First Farmer in the jiazi cycle, the Purple Void Primordial Lady, the Lady Wei of the Southern Marchmount, first transmitted the Way of Highest Clarity to the Perfected Yang, Eastern Flower’s Supreme Assistant and Controller of Destinies. At that time, the celestial scriptures and treasured texts—such as the cloud-scripts, dragon-seals, and the eightfold configurations of the *Assembled Writings*—were beyond the comprehension of the mundane world. Our Primordial Lady, the Perfected, distinguished their talismanic scripts and oral instructions, transcribing them into clerical script. From then on, their transmission flourished, becoming the ancestral lineage of Highest Clarity.

**Establishing the Law**
The *Scripture of the Primordial Beginning* pertains to the Great Thunder Rites. The Great Purification Rites are called the *Celestial Treasure Thunder Purification* (also known as the *Celestial Treasure Purification*) or the *Jade Clarity Thunder Cavern Perfection Purification*. They comprise:
1. The Heavenly Scripture
2. The Cavern Chapters
3. The Heavenly Chapters
4. The Jade Chapters
5. The Jade Writings
6. The Numinous Talismans

Highest Clarity corresponds to the *Cavern Mystery*; Great Clarity to the *Cavern Divinity*. The Divine Empyrean aligns with the Northern Culmen; the Great Tenuity with the Purple Tenuity. The Eastern Culmen corresponds to the Southern Culmen; the Northern Culmen to the Western Culmen. The Purple Sovereign aligns with the Purple Clarity.

**Commanding the Generals**
For a Marshal, Vice Marshal, or High General, use one talismanic messenger. For a Marshal with five messengers, use one talismanic messenger. The same applies to purification and thunder rites.

The *Divine Pivot Thunder Scripture* states: The Heavenly Worthy transforms into Marshals; the Heavenly Lords serve as Generals. Yang becomes the Thunder Duke; Yin becomes the Lightning Matriarch. The left is the Earl of Wind; the right is the Master of Rain. The five directions’ stars manifest as the Five Thunders. The great deities of the eight directions become the Eight Pursuing Messengers above and the Eight Titled Divine Lords, talismanic messengers, and merit officials below. In accordance with the imperial-approved scriptures, generals are established following the statutes, their names memorialized to the Emperor, and their summons invariably answered.

**Talisman of the Primordial Lady’s Incense of Faith**
The Golden Portal’s Illustrious Congealed Dao-Transforming Radiance, the Primordial Lady, Ancestor of the Dao. The Primordial Lady’s transformed appearance: unbound hair, crimson robes with long skirts, holding a thunder casket, riding a blue-gold dragon, accompanied by two Perfected Lords.

1. 　　2. 　　3.
**Talismanic Messengers**

chunks.original_text: 霹雳飞天妙道应化真君捷疾符使杨杰，孛仗剑。 太一演圣风雷妙道广化真君捷疾符使杨显，火执戟。 并力士状，阳日用孛，阴日用火。 谢元君信香符 通妙元华太一冲和元君谢晋刚，琼瑶玉 台冲和府旸谷坛左。 咒曰：溶苏涵。 华真人信香符　朱真人信香符 祖 　　威 李真人信香符　南真人信香符 周 　　昭 黄真人信香符　张平心信香符 困 清微元降大法卷之一竟 清微元降大法卷之二 玉京流派 清微玉清 元始上帝授妙玄经应运玉策，锡玉晨道君。 劫中在大罗妙玄，劫元宝台清华妙元。 敷弘妙道，保天长存。 妙玄经 右经在殿之庑西，清玄玉英之馆。 元始雷霆下教清微应运玉策，计一百二十字。 在天乃元始天王授道君。 此策有玉国之应，策中所传三字，谨用流传。 玉晨道君授玉式，赐真元妙化天帝。 玉晨策 九天妙道真运杨元君，以大道运玄妙经，授九天洞明许元君。 大道运玄妙经 许元君有元都玉梵之章，授玉堂天山朱真人。 元都玉梵之章 梵炁结成，主张清浊。 右检万神，皆元始禁书。 此承杨元君授之后，留世袭之。 天山真人，后以雷光振元之章，授太玄青惠昭化扶桑卜真君。 雷光振元之章 卜真君以大道无量元光玉符，授昭凝神耀保天道化广元君。 道化元君，以玉英宝章，付明清道华丘 元君。 元君后以此章，授泰明清惠师真人。 清微隐诀 清微洞光，宝衡紫华，元和明道，太一神景，元君王正宏。 满月相，凤目，一字眉，披发仗剑，朱履月孛状，居玄都太冲楼右紫辉宫阙下。 宝玄经 奏三清玉帝后土，下用拜。

The Cavernous Radiance of Qingwei, the Purple Florescence of the Precious Balance, the Primordial Harmony Illuminating the Dao, the Grand Unity’s Divine Splendor—Primordial Lord Wang Zhenghong.
Full-moon countenance, phoenix eyes, single-stroke brows, unbound hair wielding a sword, vermilion shoes in the comet-star’s form, dwelling beneath the Purple Radiance Palace Tower to the right of the Grand Primordial Chamber of the Primordial Capital.

chunks.original_text: 元始朝命香符 右符，谓三界朝谒奉元始，命青帝赐香字。 凡有急奏，烧此香可达帝。 元始集万神香符 右符，道君命万神。 昔元始锡此香，道君用之。 今师流派，用此集万神。 元始檄召雷霆香符 清微通玄秘法 清微茂晨保运金明元君彭涵原，双环，面如玉，月眉，凤眼，笑容，素衣，绛裙，朱履，仗剑，乘火龙。 居井鬼之中，曰丹昭府。 领丹昭风火雷霆三万众。 自为帅 自者独蒙上帝赐号。 南炎丹刚威天激元上佐平昭元君彭涵，金兜鉴，玉相，绛衣，金甲，朱履，执火印，乘火龙。 副帅 南丹流金火铃大将军刘明，金兜鉴，面赤，金甲，绛衣，朱履，左执火铃，右仗剑。 南丹流火雷公大神朱膺，天冠，青面，朱衣，金甲，执斧钻，负雷车。 南丹流火电母元君广循，玉女状，仗剑青衣，朱履。 南丹飞天风伯神君雷光卿，天冠，面黑，金甲，绿衣，朱履，掷风车。 南丹冲天雨师神君许烈，天冠，面青，金甲，碧衣，朱履，掷雨车。 东方天雷威华神君信枢。 南方雷威和神君赵庚。 西方天雷威元神君史和。 北方天雷威猷神君吕允。 中央天雷威复神君王杰， 并王者状，火冠，钻铁，背雷车。 万元通化神卫上灵五雷符使周茂。 玄冠，紫面，金甲，玄袍，朱履，执戟。 信香符 清微飞运雷霆印 用黄素印，剪方香上召役前诣雷神。 都催令 清微演运诀

**Primordial Beginning’s Court-Mandate Incense Talisman**
The right talisman is called "Three Realms’ Court Audience Offering to the Primordial Beginning," wherein the Azure Thearch is commanded to bestow the incense character. For all urgent memorials, burning this incense allows access to the Thearch.

**Primordial Beginning’s Assembly-of-All-Spirits Incense Talisman**
The right talisman is the "Dao Lord’s Command to the Myriad Spirits." Formerly, the Primordial Beginning conferred this incense upon the Dao Lord, who employed it. Now, the master’s lineage uses it to assemble the myriad spirits.

**Primordial Beginning’s Summons-of-Thunder-and-Lightning Incense Talisman**

**Qingwei’s Esoteric Methods of Penetrating the Mysterious**
The Qingwei Flourishing Dawn Preserver-of-Fate Golden Brilliance Primordial Lord Peng Hanyuan: twin topknots, countenance like jade, crescent brows, phoenix eyes, smiling mien, plain robes, crimson skirt, vermilion shoes, wielding a sword, riding a fire dragon. Dwelling amid the Well and Ghost constellations at the Cinnabar Luminance Mansion, he commands the thirty thousand hosts of the Cinnabar Luminance Wind-Fire-Thunder.

The Southern Cinnabar Flying Heaven Wind Earl Divine Lord Lei Guangqing: celestial crown, black face, golden armor, green robes, vermilion shoes, hurling a wind chariot.

The Southern Cinnabar Soaring Heaven Rain Master Divine Lord Xu Lie: celestial crown, azure face, golden armor, jade-green robes, vermilion shoes, hurling a rain chariot.

The Eastern Heavenly Thunder Majestic Splendor Divine Lord Xin Shu.

all in royal guise, fire crowns, iron drills, bearing thunder chariots.

chunks.original_text: 清微炁枢元皇元君李谦，紫虚化完福府，披发，玉女相，绛衣，黄裙，执雷函，乘青龙。 清微元机元灵元君龙汲，元妃化洞彬府，双环，玉女相，面微赤，紫衣彩裙，执剑，乘白龙。 清微察令昭化元君休端，昭凝化阳华府，大髻，面白色，柳眉，杏目，青衣，金甲，持斧，乘黑龙。 右三师，统雷神，检雷霆。 信香符 叩请密奏立应，事急奏告。 清微飞符 右上，请三师，檄命雷霆，通用。 只就批处云：臣某昨承师授，恭准元降师旨，告行清微飞符，立应。 亦可香上烈火焚之。 口云恭奉 师君。 清微应化，广明三大元君道旨。 火急奉行。 清微灵和元君管静卿，元妃化璋元府，凤冠，玉相，自然眉，凤目，紫服，碧裙，大带，朱履，执圭，清微天中灵光宫阙下。 信香符 心香符

chunks.original_text: 长跪默念，隆育智谦虔泓清。 七遍而退。 臣昨於某年某月某日，拜席师某，传受某法派，袭清微大化。 臣某上启 祖师清微灵和元妃道君，臣所启所告，乞赐臣心通意会。 凡有恳祈，立望昭报。 凡有体天学篆，即赐感通。 右符，九道金光，自天而下，入口中便毕。 行之自验，甲日始。 清微秘旨 通用三界十方雷霆，香上存批符书篆。 清微真原印一寸三分 上清派 上清元君西华圣母，以高仙上明玉章，计三章，授许真君。 今得四字，流传于后。 高仙上明玉章 灵宝派

chunks.original_text: 内奥经 天经 玄经 洞章 天宝运灵洞章 右章上天帝君仰承宝章，应时感召，役使雷霆，策命三界，斋法通用。 灵宝运灵洞章 右临制诸天，役使雷霆，迁度经纬，辰宿承遵，策令三界，万神奉行，斋修醮告，幽显咸遵。 神宝运灵洞章 右上谒诸天，下临六合，役使雷霆，修斋奉道。 三宝信经 天宝 灵宝 神宝 右催三宝章，用大祈祷，加章之首，或独用。 三宝通运昭灵信香符 斋醮祈祷降万真通用。 清微元降大法卷之三竟 清微元降大法卷之四 无极隐文 空洞灵章 师曰：空洞灵章，泄自太虚，尊临三界，策役十方，驱运雷霆，拔赎幽阴，下应霄极。 乾　紫 上通三境诸天，香，策役雷霆，大斋焚上降圣。 束　清 上通玉帝，策役雷霆，起死回生，大斋告行，普告三界。 计　朗 上闻诸天，策役雷霆。 佩服，万神卫形。 又能开天。 悉　阿 遍通五垣，普及星辰，运行雷霆。 凡欲兴雷，洞开雷宫。 娄　浩 上朝霄汉，运行雷霆，朝奏诸天，书以符札，召集龙神。 径　皇 专役雷霆，作晴布雨，驱运狂风，立有嘉应，万邪率伏。 功　彰 旋乾转坤，调燮阴阳，和顺经纬，上而宇宙，下而男女。 服以治万疾。 炁　审 运用雷霆，燮理阴阳，催生芟邪。 又能召集龙君。 由　遏 上通宸极。
chunks.translated_text:
**Heavenly Canon of Inner Mysteries**
**Celestial Canon**
**Mysterious Canon**
**Cavernous Chapters**
**Heavenly Treasure’s Spirit-Moving Cavernous Chapter** – This chapter, revered by the Heavenly Thearch, receives the sacred writ; in timely response to invocation, it commands thunder and lightning, issues decrees to the Three Realms, and serves as the universal rite for purification observances.

**Numinous Treasure’s Spirit-Moving Cavernous Chapter** – Descending to govern all heavens, it commands thunder and lightning, shifts the warp and weft of destiny, with constellations in compliance; it issues decrees to the Three Realms, and the myriad spirits obey. For purification rites, offerings, and supplications, both hidden and manifest realms adhere.

**Divine Treasure’s Spirit-Moving Cavernous Chapter** – Ascending to audience with all heavens, descending to oversee the Six Directions, it commands thunder and lightning for purification rites and devotion to the Dao/Way.

**Three Treasures’ Faithful Canon**
**Heavenly Treasure**
**Numinous Treasure**
**Divine Treasure**
The **Three Treasures’ Summoning Chapter** is employed for grand supplications, placed at the head of memorials, or used independently.

**Three Treasures’ Spirit-Moving Luminous Faith Incense Talisman** – Universally applied in purification rites, offerings, and prayers to summon the descent of the myriad perfected.

*End of Scroll Three of the Supreme Descent of the Qingwei Dao/Way*
*Scroll Four of the Supreme Descent of the Qingwei Dao/Way*

**Wuji’s Hidden Writ**
**Vacuous Cavernous Numinous Chapters**
The Master says: The **Vacuous Cavernous Numinous Chapters** emanate from the Great Void, presiding over the Three Realms, issuing decrees to the Ten Directions, dispatching thunder and lightning, redeeming the hidden yin, and resonating below with the celestial pole.

**Qian (Purple)** – Ascends to the Three Realms and all heavens; incense is offered, thunder and lightning are commanded, and in grand purification rites, the sages descend.

**Shu (Pure)** – Ascends to the Jade Thearch, commands thunder and lightning, revives the dead, and in grand purification rites, universally proclaims to the Three Realms.

**Ji (Bright)** – Ascends to all heavens, commands thunder and lightning. When worn, the myriad spirits guard the body. It also has the power to open the heavens.

**Xi (Alas)** – Pervades the Five Enclosures, extends to all stars, and moves thunder and lightning. To summon thunder, it opens the Thunder Palace.

**Lou (Vast)** – Ascends to the celestial river, moves thunder and lightning, and presents memorials to all heavens. Written as talismanic writ, it assembles dragon spirits.

**Jing (Direct)** – Exclusively commands thunder and lightning, clears skies and brings rain, dispatches fierce winds, and swiftly yields auspicious responses; the myriad evils submit.

**Gong (Merit)** – Rotates heaven and inverts earth, harmonizes yin and yang, aligns the warp and weft; above, it orders the cosmos, and below, it regulates men and women. When ingested, it cures the myriad illnesses.

**Qi (Vigilant)** – Employs thunder and lightning, harmonizes yin and yang, hastens growth and eliminates evil. It also assembles the Dragon Lords.

**You (Hence)** – Ascends to the Celestial Pole.
